author: Jakendary
name: RepoMonitor
description: Monitors up to 5 GitHub repositories for new issues, pull requests, merged PRs, and releases, sending rich embeds to configured Discord channels. Created by Jakendary for Nexilo.org.
install_msg: Thanks for installing RepoMonitor! Use [p]load RepoMonitor, then [p]rm tokenset to set your GitHub API token. Configure repositories with [p]rm addrepoN and channels with [p]rm setchannelN (N=1 to 5). Visit Nexilo.org for more info.
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores repository names and channel IDs for configuration, but no personal user data.
